Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車屋
Entry.EnglishText: Carriage Coach

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: 世の中にはいろんな街があるんだな。 雪の降り積もった街なんて 初めて見たぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: The world really is full of all kinds of different places. This is the first time I've seen a town with snow piled up so high!

Entry.JapaneseText: ううっ……寒い！ どこかで温まりたいヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Brrr... It's freezing! I wanna find a place to get warmed up!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな悠長な事を 言っている場合じゃない。 <Cyan>幻の庭<White>の事を聞いて回るぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Now's not the time to kick back and relax. Our priority is to ask around for the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: あっちだ。街の外だヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Over there, outside of the city!

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、この街は特別警戒中です。 無用な外出は控えてください。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is currently on high alert. We ask that you refrain from making any unnecessary outings.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かあったんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did something happen?

Entry.JapaneseText: 数日前に、ガジュマとヒューマの 間で、大きな衝突がありました。 いつ何が起きるかわかりません。 充分気をつけてください。
Entry.EnglishText: Several days ago, there were major clashes between the Gajuma and Huma. You can never tell when something is going to happen, so please be extra cautious.

Entry.JapaneseText: おれたちがネレグの塔に 行ってる間に、大変な事が 起きてたんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like something huge went down while we were at the Tower of Nereg.

Entry.JapaneseText: 日に日に種族間対立は 激しくなっているようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that these racial conflicts are growing more intense with each passing day.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、港へ行こう。 ベオ平原に向かう船を 見つけるのが先だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, let's go to the harbor. We need to find a ship that's headed for the Beo Plains.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぐああああああ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaargh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: しっかりするんだ!! すぐに医者が来る!! バースの娘が来てくれる!!
Entry.EnglishText: Just hold on a little longer! A doctor will be here soon! Doctor Barrs's daughter is on her way!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした<Annie>？
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter, <Annie>?

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いえ、 何でもありません……
Entry.EnglishText: It's... It's nothing.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……俺は……俺はバースを…… おまえの父親を殺したのは俺なんだっ！ 憎いだろう……憎め……恨め……!!
Entry.EnglishText: I... I killed him... I'm the one who killed your father! You hate me, don't you? You resent me... You despise me!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな…… 事実はそうかもしれない。 でも、でも、あなたは……!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! It's true that you did that, but...but you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short on money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Travel by Carriage? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車で<unk18:48D40428B8048880>に移動します。 料金<nmb:12C>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>The fare to <unk18:48D40428B8048880>is <nmb:12C> Gald. Embark Stay

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は現在、特別警戒中です。 外出は控えてください。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is currently on high alert. Please refrain from making any unnecessary outings.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父ちゃんが、ガジュマの形の 雪だるまを作れって言うんだけど、 雪で角を作るのが難しいんだよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Daddy said I should make a snow Gajuma, but it's hard to make horns out of snow...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度、雪だるまコンテストが あるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's gonna be a snowman contest soon.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマには絶対負けるなって 父ちゃんに言われたんだけど…… どうしてなんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Daddy told me I can't lose to the Huma... But why'd he say that?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、お姉さんたちの事、 嫌いじゃないけど…… 街のヒューマは嫌いだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't hate you guys... But I don't like the Huma in town...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今でもイジワルするし…… なんか恐いし……
Entry.EnglishText: They keep bullying me...

Entry.JapaneseText: おじさん……おじさんは、 ヒューマの事、キライじゃないの？ 一緒にいて、ケンカしないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey...you don't hate the Huma, do you? You're together with them, but you aren't fighting.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ……ヒューマの人が 殴ったりいじわるしなかったら、 ホントは嫌いじゃないのに……
Entry.EnglishText: If the Huma didn't hit me and be mean to me, I'd be okay with them...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、お兄さんたちの事、 嫌いじゃないけど…… 街のヒューマは嫌いだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't hate you guys... But I don't like the Huma in town...

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、やっぱり、 殴られた事、忘れられないし……
Entry.EnglishText: I'll never forget how they hit me...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマの 女王様を殺そうとしたって みんなが言ってるよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone's saying the Huma tried to kill the Gajuma queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ、やっぱりヒューマの事、 嫌いになっちゃったかも……
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe the Huma really are bad...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマの 女王様を殺そうとしたって みんなが言ってるよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone's saying the Huma tried to kill the Gajuma queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして、ヒューマは そんな事するの？
Entry.EnglishText: Why would they do that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはなんで、 ガジュマを嫌うのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: Why do the Huma hate Gajuma...?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、この街では、みんな家の中にいて、 あんまり大きなケンカにならないって 父ちゃんが言ってたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: My daddy said it's too cold here, so everyone stays inside instead of arguing with each other.

Entry.JapaneseText: あったかいところの人は タイヘンだよね。 例えばサニイタウンとか ミナールとか……
Entry.EnglishText: I bet there's a lot of fighting in places where it's warm, like Sunnytown and Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマがガジュマをキライだから 色んな街で色々タイヘンな事が 起こるんだって聞いたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard there's a lot of bad stuff happening everywhere because the Huma hate the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街の人は 寒いからずっと家の中にいて、 あんまり大きなケンカにならないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: But it's too cold to stay outside here, so people don't get into as many arguments...

Entry.JapaneseText: あったかいところの人は タイヘンだろうな…… 例えばサニイタウンとかミナールとか……
Entry.EnglishText: I bet there's a lot of fighting in places where it's warm, like Sunnytown and Minal.
Entry.Notes: this is still basically the same text as above. also it's hard to tell which of these are directly connected so some sentence starters might need to be adjusted

Entry.JapaneseText: 何？ 南の空の方から 聞こえるみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? What's that noise coming from the south...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはどうして ガジュマをキラうのかな？ オレ、わからないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Why do Huma hate Gajuma? It doesn't make any sense...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは前からガジュマの 事がキライだったって、 誰かが言ってたよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Someone told me Huma have always hated Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ほんとうなの？ どうして、ヒューマは ガジュマがキライなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that true? I don't get it.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレ……ヒューマの事、 キライだったけど、やめた。
Entry.EnglishText: I used to hate Huma... But I realized I shouldn't.

Entry.JapaneseText: ギンナルさんも、ユシアさんも、 ドルンブさんもヒューマだけど カッコイイし、強いもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Ginnar, Yucia and Drombe are all Huma, but they're all super cool and nice!
Entry.Notes: dunno how their names are being spelt

Entry.JapaneseText: 雪だるま…… 作ろうかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... Should I make a snowman...?

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスがいつまた 現れるかわからない。 十分気をつけてくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: We don't know when Biruses might attack again. Don't let your guard down!
Entry.Notes: is that what you guys are calling them? no. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ↑ 人魚広場 → 街の出口
Entry.EnglishText: ↑ Mermaid Square → Exit
Entry.Notes: dunno if there's already a name being used for that

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……？
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>か……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right?
Yeah...

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Eugene>、今のバイラス、 そんなに強いヤツだったの？ それとも、敵には能力者もいたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Eugene>, just how strong were those Biruses? Or was there also an enemy Force User there?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どういう意味だ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about?

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、街の中にいたのに フォルスキューブが すごい反応をしたんだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, the Force Cube was showing an extremely strong reaction to something just now, even though we were all the way back at the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、それは俺のフォルスだろう。 不意を突かれて慌ててしまったんだ。 それで、ついフォルスを高め過ぎた……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, that must have been <Italic>my</Italic> Force. I was ambushed and I panicked, so I must have gone overboard.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……珍しいね。 <Eugene>が慌てるなんてさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, okay... But that's kinda strange. You're not usually the type to panic.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それより、充分な 休息はとれたか。
Entry.EnglishText: ...More importantly, are you all fairly well-rested?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、ボクたちは もう平気……だよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, we're all good to go... Right, guys?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、だがあんたは 今の戦いで……
Entry.EnglishText: We might be, but you were fighting, just a second ago...

Entry.JapaneseText: 大して力は使っていない。 大丈夫だ……
Entry.EnglishText: I hardly expended any of my strength. I'll be fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少し休憩したら、 ネレグの塔に出発しよう。
Entry.EnglishText: We can rest for a little while longer, and then head on over to the Tower of Nereg.
